discussion.title: How to tell Symbolic Regression to create trees without using constants?
discussion.body:
Hi,

I wonder how can we tell SymbolicRegression.jl to not use any constants (e.g., 2.0, 15.6) when it creates trees. I am using SRRegressor via MLJ interface. Thank you.

Regards

nodes.body: You can set the complexity of constants to a very large number. Like `complexity_of_constants=100`. Then it will avoid them.
